notes.text:
This update for libarchive fixes the following issue: 

- Fix a heap-based buffer overflow (CVE-2016-1541, bsc#979005)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the zip_read_mac_metadata function in archive_read_support_format_zip.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted entry-size values in a ZIP archive.
notes.title: CVE description
